Package de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto

Class SplitKeyEncryption

java.lang.Object
de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.SplitKeyEncryption
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class SplitKeyEncryption extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Implement encryption by key generated from several source bytes and a key

  • Constructor Details

    • SplitKeyEncryption

      public SplitKeyEncryption(byte[] hmacKey, byte[]... sourceBytes) throws InvalidKeyException, NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor for this instance

      Attention: The caller is responsible for clearing the source byte arrays with Arrays.fill() after they have been used here.

      Parameters:
      hmacKey - Key for the HMAC of the source bytes
      sourceBytes - Bytes that the key is derived from
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - The HMAC key or the source bytes are not valid
      InvalidKeyException - if the key is invalid (must never happen)
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the encryption algorithm is invalid (must never happen)
      NullPointerException - if hmacKey or any source byte array is null

  • Method Details

    • encryptData

      public String encryptData(byte[] byteArrayToEncrypt, String subject) throws de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException
      Encrypt a byte array under a subject
      Parameters:
      byteArrayToEncrypt - Byte array to encrypt
      subject - The subject of this encryption
      Returns:
      Printable form of the encrypted string
      Throws:
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException - if a parameter of a cryptographic method is invalid (must never happen)
      NullPointerException - if byteArrayToEncrypt or subject is null

    • decryptDataAsByteArray

      public byte[] decryptDataAsByteArray(String stringToDecrypt, String subject) throws de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException, de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException
      Decrypt an encrypted string under a subject and return a byte array

      The contents of a byte array can be cleared after use.

      Parameters:
      stringToDecrypt - String to decrypt
      subject - The subject of this decryption
      Returns:
      Decrypted string as a byte array
      Throws:
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException - if the checksum does not match the data
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given string does not adhere to the format specification
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException - if a parameter of a cryptographic method is invalid (must never happen)
      NullPointerException - if stringToDecrypt or subject is null

    • decryptDataAsByteArray

      public byte[] decryptDataAsByteArray(String stringToDecrypt) throws de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException, de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException
      Decrypt an encrypted string and return a byte array

      The contents of a byte array can be cleared after use.

      Parameters:
      stringToDecrypt - String to decrypt
      Returns:
      Decrypted string as a byte array
      Throws:
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException - if the checksum does not match the data
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given string does not adhere to the format specification
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException - if a parameter of a cryptographic method is invalid (must never happen)
      NullPointerException - if stringToDecrypt is null

    • decryptDataAsCharacterArray

      public char[] decryptDataAsCharacterArray(String stringToDecrypt, String subject) throws CharacterCodingException, de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException, de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException
      Decrypt an encrypted string under a subject and return a character array

      The contents of a character array can be cleared after use.

      Parameters:
      stringToDecrypt - String to decrypt
      subject - The subject of this decryption
      Returns:
      Decrypted string as a character array
      Throws:
      CharacterCodingException - if the data contain a byte sequence that can not be interpreted as a valid UTF-8 byte sequence
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException - if the checksum does not match the data
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given string does not adhere to the format specification
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException - if a parameter of a cryptographic method is invalid (must never happen)
      NullPointerException - if stringToDecrypt or subject is null

    • decryptDataAsCharacterArray

      public char[] decryptDataAsCharacterArray(String stringToDecrypt) throws CharacterCodingException, de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException, de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException
      Decrypt an encrypted string and return a character array

      The contents of a character array can be cleared after use.

      Parameters:
      stringToDecrypt - String to decrypt
      Returns:
      Decrypted string as a character array
      Throws:
      CharacterCodingException - if the data contain a byte sequence that can not be interpreted as a valid UTF-8 byte sequence
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException - if the checksum does not match the data
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given string does not adhere to the format specification
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException - if a parameter of a cryptographic method is invalid (must never happen)
      NullPointerException - if stringToDecrypt or subject is null

    • decryptDataAsString

      public String decryptDataAsString(String stringToDecrypt, String subject) throws CharacterCodingException, de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException, de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException
      Decrypt an encrypted string under a subject as a string
      Parameters:
      stringToDecrypt - String to decrypt
      subject - The subject of this decryption
      Returns:
      Decrypted data as a string
      Throws:
      CharacterCodingException - if the data contain a byte sequence that can not be interpreted as a valid UTF-8 byte sequence
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.DataIntegrityException - if the checksum does not match the data
      IllegalArgumentException - if the given string does not adhere to the format specification
      de.db.bcm.tupw.crypto.InvalidCryptoParameterException - if a parameter of a cryptographic method is invalid (must never happen)
      NullPointerException - if stringToDecrypt or subject is null

    • close

      public void close()
      Secure deletion of keys

      This method is idempotent and never throws an exception.

      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
